section.title: TaskManager_2.h
section.programlisting: 1 // Main program include for TaskManagerRF 2 // Note this file should only be #include'd from the main program. 3 // Other C++ files in the program should #include TaskManagerSub.h 4 #ifndef TASKMANAGER_H_INCLUDED 5 #define TASKMANAGER_H_INCLUDED 6 7 //#define TASKMANAGER_DEBUG 8 #include <TaskManagerMacros_2.h> 9 #include <TaskManagerCore_2.h> 10 // These need to be here to ensure these are declared. 11 // Note that each main-file include in the TaskManager family has one of these. 12 // This ensures that the correct TaskMgr is used. 13 TaskManager TaskMgr; 14 void loop() { 15 TaskMgr.loop(); 16 } 17 #endif // TASKMANAGER_H_INCLUDED 18 19
